citation: Proclamation under the Industrial Hemp Act 2015 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Industrial Hemp Act 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Industrial Hemp Act 2015 fix 2 March 2016 as the day on which that Act commences.

23 February 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 March 2016

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
